Project Mailing Lists

These are the mailing lists that have been established for this project. For each list, there is a subscribe, unsubscribe, and an archive link.

Name Subscribe Unsubscribe Post Archive Other Archives
User List Subscribe Unsubscribe Post mail-archives.apache.org dir.gmane.org
- - - - - search-hadoop.com
Developer List Subscribe Unsubscribe Post mail-archives.apache.org dir.gmane.org
- - - - - search-hadoop.com
Commits List Subscribe Unsubscribe - mail-archives.apache.org -
Issues List Subscribe Unsubscribe - mail-archives.apache.org -
Builds List Subscribe Unsubscribe - mail-archives.apache.org -
